newsitem.title: USA: Kansas feedlot cattle trade inactive - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Kansas feedlot cattle trade inactive - USDA.

text.p: Trade was quiet, with no sales slaughter steers or heifers confirmed, USDA said.
Inquiry was moderate and demand light. Sales confirmed for the week to date on 5,200 head. Tuesday bids $66.00 per cwt, asking $68.00-$69.00. Last established prices $67.00 Friday, March 28.
Sales FOB feedlot net weights after 4 percent shrink.
Confirmed - none last week - none last year - 100
wk to date - 5,200 last week - 7,400 last year - 6,500
